snippet.title: Hotel Galactic reveal trailer - PC Gaming Show 2024
snippet.description:
Hotel Galactic is a cozy Ghibli-inspired crafting and management sim where you'll host adorable intergalactic visitors.

Follow Hotel Galactic on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/528325741/hotel-galactic-studio-ghibli-inspired-25d-inn-management?utm_source=reveal&utm_medium=yt&utm_campaign=pcgamer 

And add it to your wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2183670/Hotel_Galactic/?utm_source=reveal&utm_medium=yt&utm_campaign=pcgamer


www.pcgamer.com

Twitter: twitter.com/PCGamer
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@pcgamer_mag
Instagram: @pcgamer_mag
Facebook: facebook.com/pcgamermagazine
Forum: forums.pcgamer.com

To subscribe to the magazine in the US, UK, or elsewhere, visit magazines direct

PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
#hotelgalactic #hotelgalacticgame #pcgamingshow #pcgamingshow2024
